attributes.action: Put a Primark in the empty space in the antonine town centre in Cumbernauld
attributes.background: Myself family and friends All agree that it is a lot of Hassel to travel to Glasgow, Stirling , or East Kilbride for a few prices of things we need , it would be a lot easier for the teens if there was one closer also because we wouldn't need our parents to travel with us as it is closer

rejection.details: This would be a decision for Primark and not the UK Government or Parliament.
